posts.post_content:
Looking for John Anderson (Providence) with back brands other than Piedmont, Polar, Sweet Cap or Old Mill.  Grades 1-3, creases OK, but hoping for no/minimal paper loss.  Graded or raw OK.

PM, or pics can be sent to to [url]Iamnd2@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks...

(edited to include Old Mill)
